front.title: SIP URI Service Discovery using DNS-SD

abstract.t: This document describes how to use the DNS-based Service Discovery(DNS-SD), better known as Apple Bonjour, for advertising SessionInitiation Protocol (SIP) URIs in local area networks. Using thismechanism, a SIP user agent (UA) can communicate with another UA evenwhen no SIP registrar is available, as in a wireless ad-hoc networkfor example.
